Joining us -- Phoenix @ BioHub

We are starting our Forum

Phoenix team will present at BioHub every Thursday from 11-1pm @ BioHub located at Level 4 Santos Building to answer any questions you may have regarding to your HPC enquiries from as complex as establishing your bioinformatics pipeline to as simple as require your Phoenix/HPC access.
Only things you will need to bring are your laptop and of cause your questions. Phoenix team will be excited to see you there.

Written on June 19th, 2017 by Robert Qiao
Feel free to share!
